text: This is a list of airports in Brunei (Brunei Darussalam), sorted by location. __TOC__ == Airports == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- valign=baseline style="font-weight:bold; background:#DDDDDD" | City served | District | ICAO | IATA | Airport name | Coordinates |- valign=top | Bandar Seri Begawan | Brunei-Muara | WBSB | BWN | Brunei International Airport | |- valign=top | Seria / Anduki | Belait | WBAK | | Anduki Airfield | |} == See also == * Transport in Brunei * List of airports by ICAO code: W#WB - Brunei and Malaysia * Wikipedia:WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Asia#Brunei Darussalam == References == * Department of Civil Aviation, Ministry of Communications * * - includes IATA codes * Great Circle Mapper: Brunei ==External links== Brunei Airports Airports Brunei
